snippet.title: Futuridium EP
snippet.description:
Futuridium EP is OUT NOW!
Download the PC Windows/Mac versions FREE from the official website:

http://www.futuridium.com

iOS version on the App Store for 1.99$!
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/futuridium-ep/id655533271?ls=1&mt=8

Blast energy cubes on giant space dreadnought, with only you lasers, reflexes and skill as your weapon. Oh, and the ability to turn your ship 180° with the press of a button.

- 13 levels
- 11 music tracks, 45 minutes original soundtrack
- mindbending fast action

Totally free for PC/Mac, Linux coming soon.
iOS version coming soon.

Trailer music: Me Like Cyan - Qubit
https://www.facebook.com/ThisIsQubit

http://futuridium.com
https://www.facebook.com/MixedBagGames
